The investigator hypothesize feasible conduct randomize , parallel arm , control dietary intervention pilot study involve 24 subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Dietary Intervention Based Upon Advanced Glycation End Products
DOC.detailed_description: Advanced glycation end product ( AGEs ) , bioactive molecule form non-enzymatic glycation protein , emerge possible dietary risk factor many key adverse health outcome related obesity age . Major source systemic AGEs endogenous AGEs generate body exogenous AGEs find food . When food heat high temperature , characteristic `` browning '' generate Maillard reaction product , know AGEs . Although AGEs implicate atherosclerosis , insulin resistance , diabetes , cardiovascular disease , aging-related eye disease , Alzheimer 's disease , chronic kidney disease , possible adverse effect dietary AGEs well characterize human . The objective study determine whether feasible conduct randomize , parallel arm , control dietary intervention pilot study involve 24 subject ; compare effect high-AGE low-AGE diet ( ) serum urine carboxymethyl-lysine serum receptor AGEs ( RAGE ) , ( b ) endothelial function , ( c ) interleukin-6 , C-reactive protein , ( ) lipid , ( e ) adipokines , ( f ) glucose metabolism insulin resistance , ( g ) renal function , ( h ) cognition .
DOC.criteria: 50 year old less 70 year age Nonsmoker Body mass index 18.5 < 30 mg/kg2 Diabetes , thyroid disease , angina , myocardial infarction , heart failure , stroke , peripheral artery disease , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , inflammatory bowel disease , liver disease , chronic kidney disease , Raynaud 's disease Taking regular vitamin supplement , take regular vitamin supplement , willing discontinue take vitamin supplement participate study Taking vitamin B6 ( pyridoxamine ) supplement ( 50 mg ) Taking aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication ( NSAIDS ) , , willing discontinue take aspirin NSAIDS participate study Major food allergy ( i.e. , dairy , nut , etc ) History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g . vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Loss 10 % body weight within last 12 month plan initiate weight loss program next two month Selfreport alcohol substance abuse past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment study doctor may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol Not willing consume diet test study Cognitive impairment , indicate MiniMental State Exam score < 23 Triglycerides > 300 mg/dL Hemoglobin â‰¤11 g/dL Creatinine great equal 1.5 mg/dL Fasting plasma glucose > 125 mg/dL Proteinuria Long fingernails index finger hand , , willing trim two fingernail peripheral arterial tonometry conduct study Not willing give write , inform consent participate study Women lactate pregnant , plan become pregnant study
